Top On Demand App Development Company

Do you want to own app for your business? Do you find difficult to execute your app planning? We have the best plan for your on-demand mobile app development. Bring your business online and let your mobile application blow away the market. Get the packages for all type of on-demand app development services.

  • User-friendly on-demand mobility solutions
  • Customized plan for your on-demand apps
  • On-demand services with 100% data security
  • Work on strict deadline to develop a mobile solutions for restaurant
  • Non-disclosure Agreement
Free Consultations

Digitize your Business with Reliable On-demand Delivery Solutions

Revolutionize your Business with Viable on-demand app Solutions

Rapid growth in the technology has lead to businessmen drawing their business towards application. Are you the one who needs an application for your business? Then we have the perfect plan of on-demand mobile app development which will raise your business profits and audience. From food delivery app to social networking app we have a solution for each on-demand application you wish to have for your venture. We bring the out-of-the-box on-demand solutions that create an impactful impression on users and raise the users’ engagement ratio. We have clients in the USA, the UK, India, Australia, Dubai, and across the globe.

Believing in the concept of blending the creativity with technology, our on-demand developers build the application which follows the advance technology and has flamboyant designs. Creating on-demand applications for industries like house cleaning, taxi booking app, social networking app, food ordering app, laundry services app, Utility app, on-demand logistics app, online coupon app and the list is so on. Our experts analyze the market needs and requirements before mapping any plan for your application.

After mapping, various combination of technologies is selected to match the wavelength of the app. It makes the app go good in the long run. The exact analysis and proper implementation make our on-demand application go gaga around the world. Share your idea with us and let our experts build a “WOW” on-demand application for you.

Contact Us

Feature-rich On-demand Delivery App Builder

  • On-Demand Food Delivery App
  • On-Demand Retailers Delivery App
  • On-Demand Job Portal App
  • On-Demand Grocery Delivery App
  • On-Demand Flower, Gift & Cake Delivery Apps

  • On-Demand Plumbing/Laundry/House Cleaning Services Apps
  • On-demand Travel Packages Booking App
  • On-Demand Art & Culture Apps
  • On-Demand Social Networking Apps

Enhance Your Business With Our Customized On-demand App Development Services

The soul of the app is the features. It decides the user engagement and keeps the hold of the audience. You may have different taste for the features of the application. Therefore, we have the display of a lot of features which will make your decision go strong and will make you understand about the app features. Let’s tour it!

  • Web Panels
  • Mobile Apps
  • User Panel
  • Store Panel
  • Admin Panel

This panel is for the user who will use the application. From the sign in to final delivery, the app needs to be 100% user-friendly so that it is easy for the user to understand and operate the app. We have mentioned features such as sign in, sign up, product details, easy payment methods, order status and much more. Choose your features and we will implement the right plan for it.

Features –

Registration/Login

Create Profile

Multi-outlets Access

Product Details

Filter

Add to Basket

Online Payment

Payment History

Referral Code

Rate & Review

Real-Time Tracking

Add Favorite

View Full Features

The Store panel helps you to manage store profile, categories, subcategories, earning, uploading and deleting products, editing details, accepting and rejecting the request of products, and much more. It makes you handle your store easily and systematically. Entire store management is taken care through this panel. Likewise, it is easy for the admin to manage each product and its other factors to keep track of the store.

Features –

Login / Register

Manage Order

Manage Delivery

Manage Product

Add Item

On/Off Product

Multi-selection option

Set Most Popular item

History

Earning Details

Earning Statistics

Settings

Delivery Service Radius

Order Cancellation charge

Max Item Quantity

Minimum Order Amount

Categories / Subcategories

Manage Delivery Provider

Extra Charges

View Full Features

The admin panel manages the profile of users, earning and its statistical reports, tracking all active users with their geo-location, app settings, etc. These are the basic yet essential things to manage for better management. It can be managed through a dashboard and helps to track the website growth.

Using customer app, user can do sign up and sign in with a unique username or with their social media accounts. User can view nearby offers and other related products, handle the multiple products, can pay via several payment methods, track the delivery of the order, get the product at doorstep, can rate and review the services, etc.

Login / Register

This app is used by the in-between party which handles the delivery of the product. These provider app users can sign in and sign up through their social media accounts, get verification of their identity through the app, receives the online delivery request, may select or reject the service, at the selection they get the ETA, gets the navigation details.

Features –

Login / Register

Phone SMS Verification

Submit Documents

Create Profile

Delivery Request

On / Off Service

Earning Details

Bank Details

Referral Codesharing

Request Option

Transaction Requests

Navigation

Route Optimization

Calling & Messages

This app is used by store vendors and they can signup and sign in using the social media accounts. Vendors can showcase their online offers, ordering requests, etc. Notifications on pick up package and delivery status. One can also maintain the order history, earning, review for through provider app.

On-demand Application Service-centric Development Model

1

On-Demand App (B2B, B2C)

Develop the easy-to-use and customised app solutions as per business needs.

2

Design & Development

Creating innovative designs with unique functionality and result-oriented marketing strategies. Developing best and efficient data storage solutions to meet your business needs.

3

Quality check and launch

We do a rigorous quality check and compatibility testing and launch apps to the Apple store or Google store.

4

Support & Maintainance

Delivering our best services to our clients’ post-delivery of the product.

Why Should You Choose On-demand Delivery App as Your Business?

On-demand applications open the doors for a new business opportunity for all types of enterprises. Most of the business owners, from small to large enterprises are focussing on mobile applications. They are accepting that the mobile application is providing a rise in their business growth. We have the team of members who not only deliver the quality work but also provide after-sales services to make sure you don’t have any issue.

Flexible Solution

We create robust code with customised on-demand solutions that increase your sales and ROI.

In-Depth Analytics

Our experts have an advanced set of analytical techniques which dig our the valuable insights to set proper plan.

Unmatched Support

NineHertz offers the after-sales service to its clients. Our experts provide 24X7 support and maintenance.

Our Hiring Standards

Fixed Rate Hiring

For the start-ups, we suggest to share your requirement with us and we will quote a fixed charge, suits best for your venture.

Dedicated Hiring

For enterprises, it is obvious you need someone who pays full attention to your project, then you would surely hire the developers of dedicated hiring model.

Hourly Hiring

For sole entrepreneurs, hire the developers when needed. We suggest taking the hourly model when you are not sure about the graphs of the work.
